name: PLANE PUNCHER
description:
Punch your way to air superiority!

Like your favorite portable shoot-em-ups of yesteryear, except not portable and less yester in the years. Also there's no shooting. There might be punching.

Plane Puncher was the first game I released and was completed in only a week.  There will be bugs and there are plenty of things that I would change in retrospect.  I do not plan on revisiting this project, but it was a fun learning experience.
